title: Dreamweaver MX /8 -- edit a CSS style
content:
who’s with Dreamweaver 8?

did they fix this “bug”: when you edit a CSS style (MX) — you can’t see the changes; the changes don’t appear when you preview the page.
author: david hamuel

comments.content: I highly recommend [Firebug](http://web.archive.org/web/20070126001459/http:/getfirebug.com/) (Firefox plugin) or [CSSEdit](http://web.archive.org/web/20070126001459/http:/macrabbit.com/cssedit/) (Mac) if you want to make CSS changes on the fly.
I use Dreamweaver 8. I never had any problems like you mention.
Thanks Stephen. Goran — a css style located in an external style sheet.

I also have no similar problems with DW. Are you remembering to SAVE the changes before previewing? I only ask this because it’s something I forget to do frequently!  
DB~
